Package Algorithm

Class closestFruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithm.closestFruit

  • public class closestFruit
extends java.lang.Object
    this class implements an object of the shortest path algorithem, its contain a packman, a single fruit and the time it took to get from the packman to the fruit .
    Author:
    Atara Zohar & Moria Maman
